#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
#define ss 30
int h[30];
int main()
{
    int i;
    for (i = 0 ; i < 30 ; i++)
        h[i] = 0;
	char arr[100005];
	scanf("%s",arr);
	int n = strlen(arr);
	int consq = 1;
	char index;
	int maxs = -10;
	for (i = 0 ; i < n-1 ; i++)
	{
		if (arr[i] == arr[i+1])
		{
            consq++;
		}
		if (arr[i] != arr[i+1])
		{
			if (consq > h[arr[i]-'a'])
			{
				h[arr[i] - 'a'] = consq;
			}
			consq = 1;
		}
	}
	if (arr[n-2] == arr[n-1])
	{
		if (consq > h[arr[n-2]-'a'])
		{
		    //consq++;
			h[arr[n-2]-'a'] = consq;
		}
	}
	if (arr[n-1] != arr[n-2])
	{
		if (h[arr[n-1]-'a'] < 1)
			h[arr[n-1]-'a'] = 1;
	}
	for (i = 0 ; i < 26 ; i++)
	{
		if (h[i] > maxs)
		{
			maxs = h[i];
			index = (char)(i + 'a');
		}
	}
	cout<<index<<endl;
	cout<<maxs<<endl;
	return 0;
}
